text: On getting admitted to hospitalI live in the UK  not sure whether it s the same elsewhere  but there s something I don t quite get about the system  As far as I understand it  the only way of getting immediate help i e  hospital  failing an actual suicide attempt  is show up to the doctor and say  I am going to kill myself today tomorrow by doing  method  Otherwise  from my experience  it s pretty much hmm here s a slight med adjustment see how you feel come back in a month  Whilst I appreciate there simply isn t enough space in hospitals  I also don t really understand how the scenario above could ever occur  Surely if you d made the decision  you wouldn t make a doctor s appointment on the day to tell them  Has anyone here had experience of being in that situation
summary: The only way to get immediate help in a hospital is to show up to the doctor and say you're going to kill yourself today tomorrow by doing method. Otherwise, you get a slight med adjustment and come back in a month. There simply isn't enough space in hospitals.
cleaned: way immediate help hospital doctor go kill today tomorrow method slight med adjustment come month simply not space hospital

text: I don t know anymoreI just don t know anymore  I have convinced myself I am not suicidal  I convinced myself that with all the others suffering why should I  someone who has been given a great life  be allowed to die  A couple years back I broke and went to the kitchen grabbed a knife and tried stabbing myself for an hour before finally giving up and returning to my room and just crying into my pillow  I couldn t work up the courage to kill myself then and a while after that I started getting better But now I just don t see the point anymore once again  everyone and everything I know will go one day  my life is only going to be more stressful  everyday I have at least one thought of  What if I just hang myself there  Or  What if I just jump in front of that car Now with the world as it is I started questioning it as well  people get taken advantage of everyday  young girls taken advantage of by old rich men  boys also taken advantage of by others  The world is corrupt and there is nothing I can do about it  I m not special I just have to smile and pretend it isn t happening everywhere I hate this world  I hate seeing happy things destroyed  But I don t deserve to just kill myself I know that  But now it is just constant torment of  Am I going to hang myself today or will guilt get me again  Even right now I am thinking of it  if I just hanged myself right now I wouldn t have to see all this  I m afraid to think what would happen if guns were as common in Australia as they were America  Maybe I would already be dead Either way the only reason I got the courage to post this is because I m tired  Maybe I will check the replies tomorrow if there are some  I actually intended for today to be my last day but as you can see I haven t been able to do it
summary: Today is supposed to be my last day. I don't see the point of living. The world is corrupt and there is nothing I can do about it. I hate this world and I hate seeing happy things destroyed. I'm afraid to think what would happen if guns were as common in Australia as they are in America.

text: How do you satisfy your soul I would argue that my life satisfaction is a necessary motive for me to exist  The balance between my positive and negative emotions are affected by my behaviour  I may feel positive emotions on one day from exercising and negative emotions on another day from social deprivation  However  I know that on a lot of days I have strong negative emotions that are associated with my child development and past experiences in adolescence  Based on the nature of these experiences I will continue to associate them with my feelings that motivates me towards suicidal thoughts  From what I understand  this is partly why the power in my behaviour that affects my mood is limited  as the relationship between my cognitive development and my negative emotions is strong enough whereby I can do something that affects my emotions positively but instead I experience strong negative emotions  Although my suicidal thoughts will continue to negatively affect my life satisfaction  I feel empowered by the fact that my own behaviour can affect my mood positively and within this fact is my motive to exist  If this argument empowers you in some positive way then I would like to know why
summary: My life satisfaction is a necessary motive for me to exist. The balance between my positive and negative emotions are affected by my behaviour. On some days I have strong negative emotions associated with my childhood development and past experiences in adolescence. This is partly why the power in my behaviour that affects my mood is limited. I feel empowered by the fact that my own behaviour can affect my mood positively.
cleaned: life satisfaction necessary motive exist balance positive negative emotion affect behaviour day strong negative emotion associate childhood development past experience adolescence partly power behaviour affect mood limit feel empower fact behaviour affect mood positively

text: This is not an official suicide noteFor legal purposes I deny any thoughts of harm to myself or anyone else and if asked in person will deny it Now that disclaimer aside I just saw my forty seven year old crush with a twenty two year old in his lap which doesn t bode well for his thirty five year old fiance     He was one of the few guys my own age who was interested in me    Now I know he s not the only guy on earth but this echos a larger truth The larger truth is that the red pill was right  love is only about looks and beauty and the physical world I am a failing organism and the poor treatment and disrespect I get from our whole society is just a symptom of something larger I know this letter might make everyone laugh but honestly I ve been come that smelly in cell neck beard who s only joy in life is arguing with reddit trolls I hate my life  I hate most people  but worst of all I hate the feeling of my own skin I hate waking up every day being me I hate the feeling of being inside myself and even the best technology  the strictest diet or hardest work out can t fix the feeling of having my body fail on me   You can t fix aging If you are male you can be a toothless balding fifty year old covered in tats and still get a twenty year old babe in your lap my idiot friend proves that but if you are female you sit around watching this display just feeling saggy and wanting to throw up your food I miss being loved and cared about even though it wasn t real I hate people because they ve abused my my entire life and that s a universal truth of life on this planet as well I fucking hate other people    A lot
